events.name: Pop Up Makerspace at Tech Saturday 2016
events.description:
We will be hosting a small pop up makerspace at Tech Saturday 2016, together with makers from our community. Join us and get a sneak preview into what Maker Faire Singapore will be like. 
You can try your hands at soldering with Science Centre Singapore, make a stop motion animation with Imagin8ors and learn hands on electronics with Ground Up Initiative
events.location: Convention Centre @ Suntec City, Halls 403-404, , Singapore

events.name: Conversations: The Data Route
events.description:
Sat, 21 May, 2pm
Expression Gallery, Level 4
Free admission. Register in the Lobby.

Are you ready for the era of Big Data? Join us as we discuss and investigate the route that Big Data has taken, and how this affects the way information is communicated, shared and used in our digital age. Speakers include co-curator of Big Bang Data Jose Luis, artists Ingo Gunther, Lise Autogena and Joshua Portway, psychotherapist Teodora Pavkovic amongst other esteemed speakers.

Programme 
2.00pm: Welcome by Honor Harger
2.10pm: José Luis de Vicente
2.30pm: Ingo Günther, 
2.50pm: Lise Autogena and Joshua Portway
3.10pm: Q&A
3.25pm: Break
3.35pm: Welcome back 
3.45pm: Oliver Chen
4.05pm: Damien Yee
4.25pm: Teodora Pavkovic
4.45pm: Q&A 
5.00pm: Event Ends
